text: Good evening, have you heard of Save the Children charity?
No, tell me about it!
It is a non-government organization that supports children and gives help.
Where is the organization based?
It is based out of London but is a world-wide organization.
What kind of support does it provide to children?  Food? Medical? Education?
It is dedicated to helping children in distress, such as during a hurricane disaster. It also helps the children in underprivileged countries.
How does the aid reach the children?
Through donations in all parts of the states. They have fundraisers during the year to make money for the children.
No, I mean how effective ifs the organization at getting the aid to the children.  So many times money to charity is wasted on ineffective policies, politics and poor routes of delivery.
Over 88% of the money goes to the children. This organization is very efficient and only 5% goes to the administrators.
That  is good.
Yes, they are a very worthy organization.  Their vision is a world in which every child attains the right to survival, protection, development and participation.
Sounds like a good cause.
Yes, a very worthy cause. Do you think this is something you would be interested in helping the children get a good start in life?
Yes, I think I could help out with that!
That is great and the donation is tax deductible. How much would you like to donate to this great organization?
Let me think about it for a minute...
Sure, no problem.
I would be happy to donate $1.00
Thanks. You are making a difference in a child's life, one which will be greatly appreciated.
You are welcome!
